package_spec.name: Registry - Set Value
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"label":"OS Architecture","key":"$1","value":"","helpString":"For target devices running a 64-bit OS, indicate whether values associated with keys registry","requireSelection":true,"promptText":"","defaultValue":"","values":["32","64","Both"],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter"},{"maxChars":1048576,"validationExpressions":[{"expression":"\\S","helpString":"You Name","key":"$2","restrict":null,"value":"","helpString":"Enter the fully qualified path of the Registry Key","promptText":"HKLM\\Software\\Tanium\\Tanium Client","defaultValue":"","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"},{"maxChars":255,"validationExpressions":[{"expression":"\\S","helpString":"You must enter a value","flags":"","model":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression","parameterType":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression"}],"label":"Value Name","key":"$3","restrict":null,"value":"","helpString":"Enter the Value Name associated with the Registry Key above to add or update","promptText":"Version","defaultValue":"","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"},{"maxChars":1048576,"heightInLines":5,"validationExpressions":[],"label":"Value Data","key":"$4","restrict":null,"value":"","helpString":"Enter the data to associate with the registry value","promptText":"4.0.314.7020","defaultValue":"","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextAreaParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextAreaParameter"},{"label":"Value Type","key":"$5","value":"","helpString":"Select a Valid Registry Data Value Type","requireSelection":true,"promptText":"","defaultValue":"","values":["REG_SZ","REG_EXPAND_SZ","REG_BINARY","REG_DWORD","REG_QWORD","REG_MULTI_SZ"],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter"}],"model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}

package_spec.name: Uninstall MSI ||Installed Applications_Name||
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:3600 uninstall.vbs "||Installed Applications_Silent Uninstall String||" "||Installed Applications_Uninstallable||"

package_spec.name: Managed Application Upgrade - ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Name|| ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Current Version||
package_spec.command: cmd /c ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Command|| & cmd /c cscript //T:3600 "..\..\Tools\Managed Applications\run-managed-applications-scan.vbs"

package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Disabled

package_spec.name: Modify Tanium Client Setting
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"label":"RegType","key":"$1","value":"","helpString":"Required: Select one registry value type","requireSelection":true,"promptText":"Choose a registry value type","defaultValue":"","values":["REG_DWORD","REG_SZ"],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter"},{"maxChars":64,"validationExpressions":[{"expression":".\\S*","helpString":"Only alpha characters allowed","flags":"","model":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression","parameterType":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression"}],"label":"ValueName","key":"$2","restrict":null,"value":"Client Setting Name goes here","helpString":"Required: Enter the client setting name. Be sure to include underscores '_' where needed. Spaces are generally not supported.","promptText":"Client Setting Name","defaultValue":"Client Setting Name goes here","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"},{"maxChars":256,"validationExpressions":[],"label":"ValueData","key":"$3","restrict":null,"value":"Client Setting Data goes here","helpString":"Required: Enter the client setting data. Enter word 'remove' to delete the setting.","promptText":"Client Setting Data","defaultValue":"Client Setting Data goes here","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"}],"model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}

package_spec.name: Set Windows Tanium Client Logging Level
package_spec.display_name: Set Windows Tanium Client Logging Level
package_spec.command: cmd /c reg add "HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" /v LogVerbosityLevel /t REG_DWORD /d $1 /f
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"label":"Log Level (0-99)","snapInterval":1,"key":"$1","maximum":99,"value":"1","helpString":"Enter a logging level, 0=no logging, 99=verbose logging","defaultValue":"1","stepSize":1,"minimum":0,"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
